attributes.action: have the word "Great" removed from First Great Western's name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that 
First Great Western should cease from using the word "great" in their name.

According to the Oxford English Dictionary the word "great" means "of ability, quality, or eminence considerably above the average."

We argue that this is most certainly not the case and any use of their current name is misleading to the public who may mistakenly expect a great service.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
